author: Francis Frobel
text: Need sample of RFP prepared for hiring of external auditing firm. We are small community and have decided to seek proposals from auditing firms after being with the same firm for many years. Any help is most appreciated. Thank you, Fran Frobel
title: RFP external auditing services
